The couple shared the heartwarming news on Instagram, revealing their newborn has joined their three older children. This expansion of their family brings immense happiness, with Iglesias reportedly prioritizing fatherhood over his demanding career.

description: India’s 14-year-old star Vaibhav Sooryavanshi had a tough U19 Asia Cup final as India lost heavily to Pakistan. After a quick 26, he was dismissed early, and India collapsed in the chase. Post-match, he was booed by fans outside the stadium but stayed calm. Despite the loss, he finished the tournament with impressive overall numbers.

title: 'Disrespectful': Pak's Sarfaraz lashes out at India U19 boys; calls their act 'unethical'
description: Pakistan won the Under-19 Asia Cup by thrashing India by 191 runs, ending a 13-year title wait. After the final, mentor Sarfaraz Ahmed accused India of “unethical” behaviour and poor sportsmanship. He said he asked his players to celebrate respectfully and confirmed viral remarks urging discipline. The comments added controversy to Pakistan’s dominant victory.

title: 57 local bodies: Poll results out, but Maharashtra parties await ruling
description: The Supreme Court will deliver a crucial verdict on January 21. This decision will determine the fate of 57 local bodies in Maharashtra. These bodies saw their election results declared. The issue concerns reservation quotas exceeding the 50% limit. Both Mahayuti and MVA alliances have victories impacted by this legal challenge.

title: As tension rises, Bangladesh shuts visa operations in Delhi
description: Amidst escalating tensions, Bangladesh has suspended consular and visa services in Delhi, citing 'unavoidable circumstances.' This move follows claims of threats to its high commissioner. Meanwhile, India has reopened its visa centers in Khulna, Rajshahi, and Sylhet, prioritizing humanitarian needs, particularly for medical visa applicants, despite security concerns.

title: India seals trade pact with New Zealand, gets tariff-free access to markets
description: India and New Zealand have inked a free trade agreement, aiming to double bilateral trade within five years. This pact grants India tariff-free access to New Zealand's markets for key sectors like textiles and engineering goods. New Zealand also pledged $20 billion in investment, while India offered market access on over 70% of tariff lines, excluding sensitive products like dairy.

Delhi pollution: GRAP-IV flags polluters, but gaps in emission testing cloud true picture
description: Delhi's environment minister revealed over 10,000 vehicles failed emission tests under GRAP-4, with 2 lakh receiving PUC certificates after the 'No PUC, No Fuel' rule. The government is upgrading testing centers and introducing third-party inspections for accuracy and transparency. Experts, however, highlight current tests' limitations, advocating for mileage and maintenance in certification.

Police registered a case under the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita and the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act. Efforts are ongoing to apprehend two other individuals seen in the footage.

The incident highlights the devastating impact of misinformation and mob violence.

The accused have been arrested and confessed to the brutal crime.

US Embassy in India issues worldwide alert for H-1B & H-4 visa applicants - what to know
description: The US Embassy in India has issued a worldwide alert for H-1B and H-4 visa applicants, expanding social media screening for all individuals. This new protocol, effective immediately, aims to prevent program abuse while allowing companies to hire international talent. Applicants are advised to apply early due to anticipated processing delays.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
description: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to more predictable automation. Executives admit a decline in AI model trust, citing instances where agents missed instructions or lost focus. This move follows significant staff reductions attributed to AI deployment, as the company navigates the gap between AI hype and practical business needs.

title: Christen Goff reveals how motherhood transformed the Goffs’ family homes
description: Christen Goff is navigating motherhood by creating two distinct yet personal homes in Los Angeles and Michigan for her and daughter Romy.  She thoughtfully designs each space to reflect its location and their evolving family identity.  Despite the challenges of a newborn and dual residences, Christen finds joy and belonging in this new chapter.

title: Who is Aaron Rodgers’ wife Brittani? Inside the Steelers QB’s marriage mystery
description: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has found unexpected peace in his marriage to Brittani.  Unlike his previous public relationships, Brittani values privacy.  Rodgers credits his wife with providing unconditional love and stability.  This new chapter sees a calmer, more focused Rodgers as he navigates his final NFL years.  His teammates and coaches notice the positive change.

title: Vince & Linda McMahon net worth 2025: WWE earnings & business success
description: Wrestling titans Vince and Linda McMahon boast a $3.2 billion net worth in 2025, largely from their WWE empire and TKO Group Holdings shares. Vince's legacy in transforming wrestling is undeniable, while Linda also carved a significant business and political path. Despite recent legal challenges for Vince, their financial success endures.
